messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: Shinsengumi game tv trailer
messages.msgSnippet: Nevermind, the game site was already posted by Sec in the messageboard. ^_^; ... From: Grace Battista To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, June 03, 2004
messages.messageBody:
Nevermind, the game site was already posted by Sec in the messageboard. ^_^;


----- Original Message -----
From: Grace Battista
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 2004 9:55 PM
Subject: [SHQ] Re: Shinsengumi game tv trailer


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> Shinsengumi - Japan TV Spot, Tell a Friend about this
> Game Trailer! ...
> http://www.gametrailers.com/gt_vault/t_shinsengumi_jptv.html
>
> Did I see a sekihoutai like jacket in there?????
>
>
> --
> Barbara Sheridan
> http://www.barbarasheridan.net

Thanks Barb,

This games been out for quite a while now... I believe gamespot and
1up.com wrote an article about it. Anyway, I've been tempted to
shell out some money for this game but I have a question to some of
our more knowledgeable members... Since this will be a PS2 import,
do you think this will run on my PS2 (US) or do I need some other
contraption installed (aka modchip)? Thanks in advance guys/gals...

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Shinsengumi game tv trailer
messages.msgSnippet: Thats for Fuun Shinsengumi. The Jacket is a jinbaori, a half coat worn for battle/over armor. I ll see if I can find the JP site for it. ... From: Barbara
messages.messageBody:
Thats for Fuun Shinsengumi. The Jacket is a jinbaori, a half coat worn for battle/over armor.

I'll see if I can find the JP site for it.

----- Original Message -----
From: Barbara Sheridan
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 2004 7:18 PM
Subject: [SHQ] Shinsengumi game tv trailer


Shinsengumi - Japan TV Spot, Tell a Friend about this
Game Trailer! ...
http://www.gametrailers.com/gt_vault/t_shinsengumi_jptv.html

Did I see a sekihoutai like jacket in there?????


--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
